prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with purple wings and a sleek black body.
I want a bat-like creature that can blend into urban environments and has a mischievous personality.
Generate a dark-type Pokemon that uses echolocation and has vibrant blue features.
Make an eerie Pokemon that thrives in caves, with sharp fangs and large wings.
Imagine a Pokemon that can navigate through forests at night, using its keen senses.
Design a creature with a unique ability to hypnotize foes, showcasing a striking color palette.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies agility and stealth, with a blend of dark and bright colors.
